snippet: Ryan Lochte led off a 4x200 freestyle relay victory, and Matt Grevers and Olivia Smoliga won the men’s and women’s 100-meter backstroke at the short-course world championships in Istanbul.
abstract: United States wins men's 4x200-meter freestyle relay and men's and women's 100-meter backstroke at short-course swimming world championships.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Lochte led off a 4x200 freestyle relay victory, and Matt Grevers and Olivia Smoliga won the men’s and women’s 100-meter backstroke at the short-course world championships in Istanbul.

headline.main: U.S. Wins More Swimming Gold Medals
headline.print_headline: U.S. Wins More Gold Medals in Istanbul
